glsa.title: OpenAFS: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A Denial of Service vulnerability has been discovered in OpenAFS.

background.p: OpenAFS is a distributed network filesystem.

description.p: Russ Allbery, Jeffrey Altman, Dan Hyde and Thomas Mueller discovered a race condition due to an improper handling of the clients callbacks lists.

impact.p: A remote attacker could construct cases which trigger the race condition, resulting in a server crash.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All OpenAFS users should upgrade to the latest version:
